title: The Edinburgh gazetteer, or geographical dictionary ...
snippet: Montrose joins with Aberdeen, Aberbro-thock, Bervie, and Brechin, in sending amember to parliament ; and it gives title ofduke, as it did formerly of earl and marquis,to the chief of the noble family of Graham.

title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: On an ordinary afternoon, indeed, and by a sIoav train, there is notmuch in the journey but Avhat is common enough: the blue sea liesbeloAv, and the fields rise inland; miles of Bervie haddocks dry onthe dykes in the sun; and the curious Aberdonian accent catches theear at roadside stations.
